content.text: Pretty good, I just got back from Comic Con. It was so much fun!
That sounds awesome! I've never been to Comic Con, but it's always looked like a lot of fun.
You should definitely go sometime! It's so much fun to meet people who are into the same things you are.
Yeah, I've heard that. I'm a big fan of comics and superheroes, so I think I'd really enjoy it.
I'm sure you would! There are so many different panels and events to choose from, so you're sure to find something you're interested in.
That's good to hear. I'm going to have to look into going to Comic Con next year.
You definitely should! It's a great time.
No problem! It's always nice to meet a fellow comic book fan.
It is! I don't know many people who are into comics, so it's always nice to talk to someone who is.
Me too! I love talking about comics with people who get it.
Me too! I feel like I can talk about comics for hours.
Me too! We should definitely talk about comics sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always looking for someone to talk to about comics.
Great! I'll message you my number
